DataElement.preferredName: New Adjuvant Hormone Therapy Administered Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to specify the new treatment initiated with an agent not previously given to produce therapeutic effects by means of change in hormone levels which augment or stimulate a primary therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to the initiation of treatment with an agent not previously given to produce therapeutic effects by means of change in hormone levels which augment or stimulate a primary therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: New; having no previous example or precedent or parallel.:Agents given to augment or stimulate a primary therapy or alleviate adverse effects caused by the primary therapy.(NCI):Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. The treatment may include administration of hormones or hormone analogs to the patient, or decreasing the level of hormones in the body by using hormone antagonists, or hormone ablation therapy. The concept covers but not limited to: intermittent or permanent hormone suppression or ablation in treatment of hormone-dependent tumors, hormone replacement therapy of any kind, hormonal component of gender reassignment therapy, hormonal contraception, surgical and radiation castration.

Concepts.definition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.
An agent that enhances the activity or therapeutic effect of another pharmacologic substance without having much, if any, therapeutic impact by itself.
Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: released as entered during ISO compliance update
